name: The Shadow's Burden
flavorText: “This power is not to be taken lightly. Those lacking in will may find they’ve lost their way should they dwell in the shadows too long.” -Demon Hunter Kunai
flavorTextHtml: “This power is not to be taken lightly. Those lacking in will may find they’ve lost their way should they dwell in the shadows too long.” -Demon Hunter Kunai

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 While equipped with a melee weapon, your damage is increased by 6000%.(4) Set:     
 Shadow Power gains the effect of every rune and lasts forever.(6) Set:     
 Impale deals an additional 75,000% weapon damage to the first enemy hit.
setDescriptionHtml:

While equipped with a melee weapon, your damage is increased by 6000%.
(4) Set:

(6) Set:
